name: ptr::metadata::DynMetadata::<Dyn>::layout

ptr::metadata::DynMetadata::<Dyn>::size_.doc: Returns the size of the type associated with this vtable.

ptr::metadata::DynMetadata::<Dyn>::align.doc: Returns the alignment of the type associated with this vtable.

alloc::layout::Layout::from_size_align_u.doc:
Creates a layout, bypassing all checks.

 # Safety

 This function is unsafe as it does not verify the preconditions from
 [`Layout::from_size_align`].

doc: Returns the size and alignment together as a `Layout`
